languages.text: "Указом Вольного Торговца члены семейства Драйвстем приговариваются к смерти за ересь и преступления против торговой династии фон Валанциус!"

traits.locale_text: "Указом Вольного Торговца члены семейства Драйвстем приговариваются к смерти за ересь и преступления против торговой династии фон Воланциус!"

languages.text: "By the order of the Rogue Trader, the members of House Drivestem are sentenced to death for heresy and crimes against the von Valancius trade dynasty!"
languages.original_text: "Указом Вольного Торговца члены семейства Драйвстем приговариваются к смерти за ересь и преступления против торговой династии фон Валанциус!"

traits.locale_text: "By the order of the Rogue Trader, the family members of House Drivestem are condemned to death for heresy and their crimes against the von Valancius trading dynasty!"
"By the order of the Rogue Trader, the family members of House Drivestem are condemned to death for heresy and their crimes against the von Valancius trading dynasty!"
"By the order of the Rogue Trader, the family members of House Drivestem are sentenced to death for heresy and crimes against the von Valancius trading dynasty!"
"By the order of the Rogue Trader, the family members of House Drivestem are sentenced to death for heresy and crimes against the von Valancius trading dynasty!"
"By the order of the Rogue Trader, the members of House Drivestem are sentenced to death for heresy and crimes against the von Valancius trade dynasty!"
"By the order of the Rogue Trader, the members of House Drivestem are sentenced to death for heresy and crimes against the von Valancius trade dynasty!"

languages.text: 「自由開拓者の命により、ドライブステン家の一族に異端とフォン・ヴァランシウス貿易王朝への反逆罪で死刑を宣告する！」
languages.original_text: "By the order of the Rogue Trader, the members of House Drivestem are sentenced to death for heresy and crimes against the von Valancius trade dynasty!"

traits.locale_text: 「自由開拓者の命により、ドライブステン家の一族に異端とフォン・ヴァランシウス貿易王朝への反逆罪で死刑を宣告する！」

languages.text: “行商浪人有令，德莱夫斯塔家族涉嫌传播异端，意图危害冯·瓦兰修斯贸易王朝，现判处死刑！”
languages.original_text: "By the order of the Rogue Trader, the members of House Drivestem are sentenced to death for heresy and crimes against the von Valancius trade dynasty!"

traits.locale_text: “行商浪人有令，德莱夫斯塔家族涉嫌传播异端，意图危害冯·瓦兰修斯贸易王朝，现判处死刑！”

languages.text: « Sur ordre {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, les membres de la maison Drivestem sont condamnés à mort pour hérésie et crimes contre la dynastie commerciale von Valancius ! »
languages.original_text: "By the order of the Rogue Trader, the members of House Drivestem are sentenced to death for heresy and crimes against the von Valancius trade dynasty!"

traits.locale_text: « Sur ordre {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, les membres de la maison Drivestem sont condamnés à mort pour hérésie et crimes contre la dynastie commerciale von Valancius ! »

languages.text: «¡Por orden {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente, los miembros de la casa Drivestem quedan sentenciados a muerte por herejía y crímenes contra la dinastía comercial von Valancius!».
languages.original_text: "By the order of the Rogue Trader, the members of House Drivestem are sentenced to death for heresy and crimes against the von Valancius trade dynasty!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Por orden {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente, los familiares de la casa Drivestem quedan sentenciados a muerte por herejía y crímenes contra la dinastía comercial von Valancius!».

languages.text: "Auf Befehl {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} werden hiermit alle Angehörigen des Hauses Drivestem wegen Ketzerei und Verbrechen gegen die Handelsdynastie derer von Valancius zum Tode verurteilt!"
languages.original_text: "By the order of the Rogue Trader, the members of House Drivestem are sentenced to death for heresy and crimes against the von Valancius trade dynasty!"

traits.locale_text: "Auf Befehl {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} werden hiermit alle Angehörigen des Hauses Drivestem wegen Ketzerei und Verbrechen gegen die Handelsdynastie derer von Valancius zum Tode verurteilt!"

languages.text: "Drivestem Hanesi mensupları, kâfirlik etmek ve von Valancius ticaret hanedanlığına karşı suç işlemek saiklerinden Hür Tacir'in emriyle idama mahkûm edilmiştir!"
languages.original_text: "By the order of the Rogue Trader, the members of House Drivestem are sentenced to death for heresy and crimes against the von Valancius trade dynasty!"

traits.locale_text: "Drivestem Hanesi mensupları, kâfirlik etmek ve von Valancius ticaret hanedanlığına karşı suç işlemek saiklerinden Hür Tacir'in emriyle ölüme mahkûm edilmiştir!"
